alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 28 at 4:07AM EDT until October 28 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Middle and Lower Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through this evening, but mainly during the evening high tide. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
